TopicTitle: Game crash on load game (x64 build)

Articles.Content:
First I had loads of mods, but after I saw this I tried to reproduce this without mods (Copied fresh unmodded version from steam folder). Sure enough it happens 100% certainty on my machine. Here are my steps:

1) Launch the game, delete any save games present, create new game.

2) Go to VAB, create a small craft and save it.

3) Quit game

4) Reload game and try to load save game.

-- CRASH --

I've repeated these steps a few times and they seem to trigger the problem reliably.

What happens is that the text "timewarp x1" comes up on black screen, and then nothing happens. On the background, a crash reporter window is opened.

The game creates some crash report files; I would have attached them here, but I don't see attachment options(??)
You need to post the files elsewhere then post the links here CremionisD
